Dec. 10, 2025:

Focus this week on Impact Reviews and identifying/getting ahead of FY25 risk. Use Kepler to analyze customer health signals, communication patterns, and engagement trends to proactively address potential churn or contraction risks.
tool_update:
v2.1.6 - Brief Generation Improvements: Significantly improved brief generation reliability and quality with native structured outputs, optimized summarization (caching, batching, concurrency), and enhanced chat streaming.

Additional fixes: Slack API Authorization Bearer headers, Okta domain-specific OAuth config, client-side Ed25519 authentication, deprecation warnings resolved.
